title: Huawei Watch D Hands-on | The best smartwatch at IFA 2022

media:group.media:title: Huawei Watch D Hands-on | The best smartwatch at IFA 2022
media:group.media:description:
With virtually no sound, but considerable wrist pressure, the Huawei Watch D took my blood pressure while I sat in a booth at IFA 2022 in Berlin. That's right, just some wearable technology from Huawei performing a function typically the sole purview of those cuffs you wear in the doctor's office. It felt halfway between uncomfortable and impossible. 

#Techradar #Tech #Huawei #huaweiwatchD #smartwatches
